content: Savings Investments Credit Card Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Sep 2019Would like to know which of the banks I can open a USD account in Singapore?What should I take note of?1 answerAnswerBump0

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 08 Sep 2019Citibank and Stanchart have stand-alone USD accounts if I recall. The local banks have some variation of multi-currency accounts which can hold USD as well.1 comment0
